author: Rachel Sherrington
description:
Food firms are inflating their climate targets with carbon removals and weak deforestation claims, according to a report from the NewClimate Institute and Carbon Market Watch. With the COP30 climate summit in Brazil later this year widely expected to focus on agriculture, the report has raised concerns about high levels of corporate greenwashing and a lack […]

The post Food Giants’ Climate Plans Lack Credibility, New Report Finds appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Food Giants’ Climate Plans Lack Credibility, New Report Finds

author: Adam Barnett
description:
In the local elections on 1 May, Nigel Farage’s Reform UK took control of 10 councils and two regional mayoralties. The party vowed to scrap climate initiatives in the authorities, and has reportedly already set up an Elon Musk-inspired “DOGE” (Department of Government Efficiency) at Kent County Council in order to identify potential cuts to […]

The post Fossil Fuels and Fake LTNs: Reform’s Five Biggest Climate Clangers Since Local Elections appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Fossil Fuels and Fake LTNs: Reform’s Five Biggest Climate Clangers Since Local Elections
